attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please can you insist all local authorities provide wheelie bins for weekly collection of household refuse, recycling and garden waste.
It seems absurd that some local authorities still send out a roll of bin liners/ plastic bags and small recycling containers that allow waste / rubbish to be blown out of boxes, ripped out of plastic bags by vermin......

rejection.details: This is a local authority issue.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
